samples.question: The question says, what genres of music do you enjoy?
samples.transcript: And here is my answer. I have a diverse taste in music and enjoy exploring various genres. Depending on my mood, I may listen to pop, rock, classical, or even jazz. Each genre offers a unique experience and allows me to appreciate different musical styles and artists. So as you see here, I try to talk about different music genres. And of course I used the term diverse tastes.

And of course I used the term diverse tastes.

Each genre offers a unique experience and allows me to appreciate different musical styles and artists. So as you see here, I try to talk about different music genres. And of course I used the term diverse tastes.

samples.question: When do you usually listen to music?
samples.transcript: And here is my answer. I listen to music throughout the day, but I find myself listening to it most frequently during my commute. It not only helps pass the time, but also sets a positive tone for the day ahead. Additionally, I often listen to music while doing chores or engaging in hobbies like reading. So here again I used some good collocations like to pass the time or it sets a positive tone. And of course the word commute instead of saying going and coming back. For example when you go to work and you come back home you commute to work. So you can also use some paraphrase form of the words and this is exactly what I did here. Or, doing chores or engaging in some hobbies. It means to do some hobbies or getting involved in something. I also use not only but also to add more information or the word additionally instead of and. Now the next one.

samples.question: Do you ever attend live music performances?
samples.transcript: And here is my answer. Absolutely. I am a big fan of live music performances. There is an unmatched energy and connection that comes from witnessing talented musicians perform right in front of you. I try to attend concerts and music festivals whenever possible to fully immerse myself in the experience. Here again, for example, in the first sentence I said I am a big fan of something, which means I really like or enjoy something. I am interested in something. The next one was an unmatched energy which means a level of energy that is incomparable to anything else Something unique I also used to immerse myself It means when you try to experience something or to engage in something Now the next question Do you think music plays an important role in people's lives? And my answer is definitely. Music plays an incredibly important role in people's lives. It has the power to evoke emotions, bring people together, and provide peace during difficult times. So here again, I try to explain a little bit because maybe I did not have many ideas to talk about, but anyways, you just need to keep talking, keep explaining. And I use, for example, it plays an incredibly important role. It means it is important. It plays a role. Or it evokes emotions. Now the last one.

samples.question: What kind of place is it?
samples.transcript: I live in Tehran, which is the capital city of my country. it is a bit, not a bit, it is quite crowded and polluted of course. But, besides, it is a vibrant city.

samples.question: Did you learn riding a bicycle when you were a child?

samples.question: And what kind of apps do youngsters use mostly in your country?

samples.question: And should children be encouraged to study through educational apps on phone?
